tp.pr1

Class Instruction

  • java.lang.Object
    • tp.pr1.Instruction

  • public class Instruction
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the information parsed from the input. It represents an instruction that can be interpreted by the robot An instruction encapsulates an Action a Rotation (if the action is TURN)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Instruction()
      Default constructor.
      Instruction(Action action)
      Creates an instruction only with the action (the rotation is UNKNOWN)
      Instruction(Action action, Rotation rotation)
      Creates an instruction with the action and the rotation parameter

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Action getAction()
      Returns the action stored in the instruction
      Rotation getRotation()
      Returns the rotation value stored in the instruction
      boolean isValid()
      Checks if the instruction is valid.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Instruction

        public Instruction()
        Default constructor. It creates an UNKNOWN action

      • Instruction

        public Instruction(Action action)
        Creates an instruction only with the action (the rotation is UNKNOWN)
        Parameters:
        action - Action Instruction

      • Instruction

        public Instruction(Action action,
           Rotation rotation)
        Creates an instruction with the action and the rotation parameter
        Parameters:
        action - Action instruction
        rotation - Direction of the rotation

    • Method Detail

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Checks if the instruction is valid.
        Returns:
        false if the action is UNKNOWN, or the action is TURN and the rotation is UNKNOWN. Return true otherwise

      • getAction

        public Action getAction()
        Returns the action stored in the instruction
        Returns:
        The stored action

      • getRotation

        public Rotation getRotation()
        Returns the rotation value stored in the instruction
        Returns:
        The stored rotation
